name: Girl Friend need for Bike Racing
name_original: Girl Friend need for Bike Racing
description:
Girl Friend need for Bike Racing

Girl friend get ready to run a race in traffic.
Download this game and go for the racing,Chase the traffic with your High Speed bike and Crack The Distance,go as far as you can and be a racer between traffic by make high score.
Be careful of the traffic will be accelerated with each passing second.
Collect all the gold from the traffic accidents and make the highest score.
Make a beatiful woman with speed traffic behind you.
Go closer from the traffic and get the extra points. This game includes a different models of the sport bikes and different locations.

Key Features

-> 3D Locations

-> 3D Models of a Sports Bikes

-> Easy Controlling

-> nitrous oxide bikes

-> User Friendly Game
